DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study Dovitinib FGFR1 Amplified Squamous Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: histologically confirm squamous NSCLC Previously treat one two line chemotherapy FGFR amplification ( FISH > 5 copy gene ) 20 year old ECOG PS 02 active infection uncontrolled brain metastasis unstable angina MI
